creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: orange ground attached to muslin backing; overall design of central structure with rows of figures--family at top with couple and child; other figures, swastika design and flowers around edges; pair of peacocks and sun and moon at top; darkened metallic thread and tarnished sequins with highlights in turquoise, purple, blue, yellow, red and pink threads
title: Wall hanging
